section_title: WORKSHOP ON ENABLING ENVIRONMENTS FOR TECHNOLOGY TRANSFER
sentences: This workshop was convened from 9-10 April 2003, in Ghent, Belgium.

The workshop provided an overview of technology transfer, reviewed the draft technical paper on enabling environments for transfer of environmentally-sound technology for consideration by the Expert Group on Technology Transfer (EGTT) at its third meeting, and examined barriers and opportunities to technology transfer.

Working groups discussed ways in which governments could identify and remove barriers to technology transfer; and how multilateral lending institutions, bilateral programmes and the private sector could assist governments.
